item.title: Destroying Momentum For Innovation – Dev Leader Weekly 64
item.description: The post Destroying Momentum For Innovation – Dev Leader Weekly 64 appeared first on Dev Leader.Welcome to another issue of Dev Leader Weekly! In this issue, I discuss how focusing on roadblocks instead of solution seeking can grind engineering teams to a halt. The post Destroying Momentum For Innovation – Dev Leader Weekly 64 appeared first on Dev Leader. Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2024/10/05/destroying-momentum-for-innovation-dev-leader-weekly-64/
